body.name: Natracare Organic Cotton Super Tampons with Cardboard Applicator, Plastic Free, Chlorine Free, Biodegradable & Compostable (16 Pack, 192 Tampons Total)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 49 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: MADE SAFE certifies products made without known toxic chemicals, by prohibiting substances that harm human health or the environment.

features: PLASTIC FREE : Did you know that a pack of conventional period products contains up to five plastic bags worth of plastic? We’re here to change that, with period products that are plastic free
NATURAL MATERIAL : It’s time to go back to basics. Natracare products are made from just a few simple, natural materials. No perfume, rayon or dyes and Totally Chlorine Free
CERTIFIED ORGANIC : We only use organic cotton certified to the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS). This means the cotton we use is healthier for you, workers and the planet
ETHICAL : Our entire supply chain, from raw materials and processing, shares in our commitment to manage and monitor resources respectfully and ethically
VEGAN : A vegan lifestyle isn’t just about food. In fact, many big period product manufacturers have a history of animal testing and poor welfare standards. We don’t
body.description: Organic super tampons with a smooth easy-glide cardboard applicator, which is completely biodegradable. Just twist to release and push.Most applicators are made from plastic or rigid bio-plastics. These commonly contain phthalates, which can be absorbed through the skin and cause hormone disruption. What’s more is they don’t biodegrade, contributing to worldwide plastic-pollution.Many rayon-blend tampons have a plastic veil to prevent fibre-loss, and they can also have added perfume or dyes which is totally unnecessary for managing your period.This is why we only ever use cardboard and organic cotton. We never use GM cotton or unnecessary plastic, so we keep your vagina free from pesticide residues, plastic or toxic residuals or rayon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plastic Free and awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I have used plain Tampax tampons for years because of the all-paper packaging, cardboard applicator, and 100% cotton content. A friend recently told me about how her cramps have diminished significantly from using organic cotton tampons and I became curious. I started shopping around and was surprised at how many organic tampons had plastic applicators or excessive plastic packaging. I wasn’t expecting much based on the negative reviews I saw around Amazon, but I am thrilled with this product. Works just as well as my old favorite. Price is higher than my old brand, but this can be remedied by shopping in bulk. Welcome happy effects: they DO reduce cramping for me (fewer pain reducing drugs in my system),When you buy 12 packets at a time, ship in a cardboard case-size so no plastic door-to-door, fewer pesticides used due to organic farming. I researched the company and I like them, so I’m happy to pay them for a product rather than the old guys. This is a win/win for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped with my Endometriosis 19 years ago! Still using them!
reviews.reviewText: I don't write many reviews but thought I should. I was fighting endometriosis 19 years ago with many medical procedures and trying to make other changes as well. When I started using these tampons, I noticed a big change the first month in the amount of pain I was in. I read studies showing the bleach and other ingredients in most tampons were causing endo in animals such as monkeys being tested. I'm a big believer that those ingredients should be banned from all products but yet today they are not. This is worth spending more money for these to protect your body from chemicals going directly into your blood system! I purchase these for my daughter as well. She was born 17 years ago. I don't know if this allowed me to conceive her but I believe it certainly helped! Would never let her use any other tampon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are decent.
reviews.reviewText: The super doesn’t expand much. So I don’t consider it a true super. But I love the organic/biodegradable applicator, so I’m okay with having to make adjustments on my heaviest day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unsure about the other reviews...
reviews.reviewText: I love these after about 10 years on playtex, I wanted to try a more natural product. 7th generation makes a decent tampon but I liked this one much better.I don't like the video review that someone has posted on here. First my vagina isn't the size or shape of a paper cup. I have never had a tampon open that big nor do I ever hope it does! I've never had any "leakage" from this tampon because of the 'line' in the tampon.The second review I came across was on the regular absorbancy of these brand. Someone said that these don't absorb as well and a super is like a regular so I bought the super. I completely disagree. The super is very much a super. I wish I had purchased the regulars. If you are normally a regular on other tampons then buy a regular, I'd say purchase one box, try out the absorbancy level, then buy the case.Overall, it's a great product, does what it's intended to do and I've had no issues with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ... it has made a huge difference this tampons are perfect exactly what I needed my only complain is that ...
reviews.reviewText: I recently changed from regular tampons to organic ones and I can say it has made a huge difference this tampons are perfect exactly what I needed my only complain is that the box that this came in was damaged and it was missing one whole box of tampons and 2 of the other ones where opened but not missing any tampons i didn't take any stars because i wanna think it was probably during the shipping that it got damaged but other than that this is a great product and again you can feel in your body the positive changes that come with organic tampons and this brand is perfect to make that change

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2010
reviews.reviewText: I was very happy to find this organic option after reading about the damages that conventional cotton and cotton products cause both in the environment and in the human body. (Cotton is one of the worlds most fertilizer, pesticide and herbicide intensive crop. Scorching the soil, contaminating the water and food supply).This is a very good quality, substitute for regular cotton tampons.On the side note: The seize described as, small, medium, super are slightly smaller than the conventional cotton tampons. So, you might want to purchase a larger seize than your usual.The only thing I would (and did) complain about is the shipping package. It is weigh overpacked, (in double cardboard box) for an environmentally concious product. I hope a lot of people will complain about that so they'll reconsider the packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable product solved my long medical troubles.
reviews.reviewText: Really like this product. I was looking for other capacity of same but couldn’t find with the same seller. Others just don’t know to ship I am struggling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I wanted to love these, I wanted them to work so bad
reviews.reviewText: These are awful! I wanted to love these, I wanted them to work so bad! Now, when I can get them to insert properly they seem to do their job, HOWEVER, I have to use 2-4 tampons to get one to POSSIBLY insert correctly! The applicator does not slide!! They are frustrating and antiquated!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: Natracare Organic tampons are great, they absorb and are as comfortable as other ...
reviews.reviewText: Natracare Organic tampons are great, they absorb and are as comfortable as other brands, with the added bonus of being organic and perfume and chlorine free.
